faqs.question: What is my order status?
faqs.answer: You can track your order online using our tracking tool: https://newageproducts.com/track-shipment

faqs.question: Why is my order delayed?
faqs.answer: Due to the global supply chain issues and increased order volumes, we are unfortunately expecting delays with our deliveries. Other factors may include carrier delays due to weather, availability, etc. For an update on your order please follow this link and have your order information handy https://newageproducts.com/track-shipment If you need immediate assistance, please give our Customer Support team a call at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1 or you may use our live chat feature. We appreciate your patience and apologize for any inconvenience caused.

faqs.question: I received my order and I noticed damages or I was missing pieces.
faqs.answer: If you notice any damaged or missing pieces with your order, please make sure you complete the following steps: 1. Open up all the boxes and products and inspect them for damages. 2. To report a damaged item please complete and submit the Replacement Form https://newageproducts.com/replacement/ and make sure that you include the following in your form: - order number - brief description of the damaged unit/s or missing items - pictures of the damaged item(s) including a full view of the damaged piece along with its serial number located on the inside 3. After the form is submitted an automated email with a case ID will be sent and one of our customer service specialists will reach out to you via e-mail or by phone in regards to a resolution. If you require immediate assistance you can reach out to our customer support team by phoning 1-877-306-8930 and selecting option 1, emailing us at support@newageproducts.com or by using our Live Chat Feature. Please ensure that you have your order number on hand, and if you have submitted a Replacement Form, please reference your case ID.

faqs.question: Does White Glove Service Include Installation?
faqs.answer: White-Glove service does not include installation services, these services have to be purchased separately.

faqs.question: What are the shipping time frames?
faqs.answer: Shipping time varies depending on product lead times and the type of shipping service. Your carrier and tracking information will be provided to you once your order ships from our warehouse. We ship two ways including LTL freight and Parcel ex. UPS.

faqs.question: Can I modify my order?
faqs.answer:
If you are purchasing cabinets in a set, the cabinets come as a bundled package and are not able to be substituted. However, you can purchase individual cabinets to create your set configuration.

You can also contact one of our Sales Representatives who would be happy to assist you with your order by contacting us at 1-877-306-8930 and select the option 1.

faqs.question: Can I change the shipping address/change the delivery address?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change the shipping address. Please reach out to our customer service team at phone # 1.877.306.8930 and select option 1 or email: support@newageproducts.com and provide the new shipping address. Note: we do not deliver in Hawaii, Alaska and Puerto Rico. We also do not deliver the order in some remote regions of the US and Canada.

faqs.question: Can I return an item of my order?
faqs.answer:
Individual items within a set may not be returned, if you have purchased a set, the whole set would need to be returned. If you purchased individual items then they can be returned. Please reach out to our team customer support team at support@neawgeproducts.com or 1-877-306-8930 option 1. Please have your order number readily available.

In order to qualify for a full return, requests must be received in our office within 120 calendar days of the original delivery date. 

Products being returned must be ready for pick-up in the original boxes and securely placed on a pallet if possible. If the original boxes are not available, the product should be securely wrapped in cardboard and placed on a pallet prior to the courier arriving.  Refunds will be issued based on the original method of payment.

*Please note, Installed or used products will not be eligible for a return and refund.

faqs.question: What if I receive an incorrect item/product?
faqs.answer: Please make sure you complete the following steps: 1. Open all boxes and products, and inspect them for damages. 2. To report an incorrect or missing product, complete and submit the Replacement Form https://newageproducts.com/replacement/ and make sure that you include the following in your form: - order number - brief description of the incorrect/missing items - If your product was incorrect, you must include pictures of the incorrect boxes After the form is submitted, an automated email with a case ID will be sent to your email, and one of our customer service specialists will reach out to you via e-mail or by phone to help resolve the issue.

faqs.question: What should I expect when receiving my delivery?
faqs.answer: Please review our delivery checklist and preparing for your delivery here: https://newageproducts.com/track-shipment

faqs.question: Why have I received fewer pieces than what I ordered?
faqs.answer: If you received your delivery and seem to be missing some pieces, there may be a couple of reasons for this: 1. In some cases, cabinets can be nested inside a locker or base cabinet for shipping purposes. Make sure to open all of your cabinets to see if your missing product is nested inside another locker or cabinet. 2. The order may be shipped from multiple locations/warehouses which are known as a Split Order. To confirm if your order is a Split Order, please review your order confirmation e-mail. If your missing cabinets are not nested in another cabinet or locker, or if you have verified that your missing cabinets are not part of a split order, please make sure you complete the following steps: 1. Report the missing product, by completing and submitting the Replacement Form https://newageproducts.com/replacement/ and make sure that you include the following in your form: - order number - brief description of the missing items 2. After the form is submitted an automated email with a case ID will be sent and one of our customer service specialists will reach out to you via e-mail or by phone in regards to a resolution. If you require immediate assistance please call us at 1-877-306-8930 option 1. Ensure that you have your order number on hand, and if you have submitted a Replacement Form, please reference your case ID.

faqs.question: Where is my order being shipped from?
faqs.answer: The order is usually shipped from our nearest warehouse. If the product is not available in our nearest warehouse then the order would be shipped from the warehouse that has the order or items available.

faqs.question: Will the carrier call me before delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, when your order reaches the carrier's terminal, they will be giving you a call to schedule a delivery appointment at your registered phone number. Once your order has been shipped you will receive an email confirmation with tracking information.

faqs.question: Do I have to be there to accept the delivery?
faqs.answer: At the time of the delivery, someone 18+ must be available at the delivery address to accept the delivery and sign proof of delivery receipt.

faqs.question: What if I miss the delivery of my order?
faqs.answer: If you miss the delivery of your order. You can reach out to our customer support team at 1-877-306-8930 option 1, email us at support@newageproducts.com or by using our live chat feature Live Chat Feature for assistance on the re-delivery of your order. Also, you can contact the carrier directly to attempt re-delivery of the order.

faqs.question: Does the product get delivered to the interior of my home?
faqs.answer: At the time of checkout, you will have the option to select a curbside or white glove delivery. If you would like the product to be delivered inside your home please select the white glove delivery option. Please note, there is an extra charge for white glove deliveries. Otherwise, we offer a free standard curbside delivery, meaning the carrier will deliver the product at the end of your driveway.

faqs.question: Will the installation happen on the same day of order delivery?
faqs.answer: We cannot accommodate same day installation. Deliveries often happen late in the day and this will not leave the installer time to complete the installation.

faqs.question: How long will it take my refund to get back to me, after I start a return?
faqs.answer: The refund will be submitted for processing once we get confirmation the order is in transit and has arrived back at our warehouse facility. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect onto your original method of payment.

faqs.question: Can I cancel a return?
faqs.answer: Yes, you could cancel the return before the pickup happens. You will need to call us at 1-877-306-8930 to cancel the return. If the pickup has already occurred, the return cannot be cancelled.

faqs.question: Could I exchange any items I order?
faqs.answer: NewAge does not offer any exchanges. A return would be required, and a new order would need to be placed. Please reach out to us at 1-877-306-8930 if you need any assistance.

faqs.question: Will my shipping fee and or White Glove Service fee be refunded, if I do a return?
faqs.answer: No, these are one-time costs for delivery of orders received and will not be refunded.

faqs.question: How do I return my order if something was wrong with my delivery?
faqs.answer: Please do not refuse or return your order with our carrier if you notice any issues with your delivery. Our Customer Service team will be happy to assist you. Please ensure to document any issues such as damaged or missing items on the driver’s paperwork at the time of delivery and take photos during your delivery. You can contact us at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1 right away and we will be happy to assist you https://newageproducts.com/track-shipment

faqs.question: How can I return my order?
faqs.answer: Please reach out to our resolutions team at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 3 or send an email to resolutions@newageproducts.com

faqs.answer: No, the sets are sold at a discounted rate as opposed to purchasing the items individually. Please reach out to our Customer Service team at 1-877-306-8930 if you need any assistance.

faqs.question: What is the return period?
faqs.answer: Your order can be returned within 120 days from the date your order was delivered. Some restrictions may apply.

faqs.question: Will I be charged for the return shipping?
faqs.answer: You may be subject to a 20% restocking fee on returned items, which will be automatically charged on your original method of payment once the order is received back at our warehouse facility. You will not be charged for return shipping.

faqs.question: Do I need to return the product by myself?
faqs.answer: No,  NewAge will arrange the pickup of the products from your shipping address.

faqs.answer: Products being returned must be ready for pick-up in the original boxes and securely placed on a pallet if applicable. If the original boxes are not available, the product should be securely wrapped in cardboard and placed on a pallet prior to the courier arriving.

faqs.question: To return the product, does it have to be in unused condition?
faqs.answer: Yes, installed or used products will not be refunded.

faqs.question: Do I need to be available at the time of return pickup.
faqs.answer: Someone at the pickup address has to be available to sign the pickup receipt.

faqs.question: Will you send me the packaging if I don't have the packaging to repack the product?
faqs.answer: No, unfortunately NewAge cannot supply extra packaging for returns.

faqs.answer: If you find a lower price on Shop New Age after you order your items, please give our customer support team a call at 1-877-306-8930 option 1 and we will assist you with verifying the price match and applying the amount back to your original method of payment. *Please note, we do not price match items from our retailers or dealers e.g. Costco, home depot, lowes, etc. Price match requests must be received within 30 days of the original delivery date.

faqs.question: Will my installer be able to haul away the trash, old cabinets or any of the pallets/packaging that came with my order?
faqs.answer: No, installers are not equipped to remove or dispose of any waste.

faqs.question: Does NewAge Products price match retailers?
faqs.answer: NewAge Products does not price match items with our retailers. NewAge will price match orders purchased with NewAge within 30 days of the shipment date.

faqs.question: What are the shipping fees?
faqs.answer: If your order is shipping in the US, we charge a 15% shipping fee if your subtotal is less than $1000.00, shipping is free for orders over $1000.00. If your order is shipping in Canada, shipping charges are designated by zonal areas. Your cart will be updated with your individual area's shipping fee during the checkout process.

faqs.question: Do you provide design/layout services?
faqs.answer: We offer a Free Design Service. Complete the design form here: https://newageproducts.com/design-services/

faqs.question: Are NewAge Products sold internationally?
faqs.answer: Our cabinets are sold in Canada as well as the United States

faqs.question: What if I need help with the installation
faqs.answer: NewAge Products offers Standard and Premium Installation Service packages, with knowledgeable, bonded and insured local contractors who are trained on installing our products. Our Installation Services packages include moving your product to the desired location, unpacking all of your items, installation and mounting (when applicable), levelling of products, and clean up of all product packaging for disposal. Visit our Installation Services to learn more about our installation services options. The cost of the installation is dependent on the number of pieces in your set. faqs.answer: We are able to create a 3D design of your space to help you visualize your space and offer the optimal setup for your space.

faqs.answer: Explore the dimensions sheets for all product categories

faqs.question: Where can I install my NewAge Stone Composite flooring?
faqs.answer:
NewAge Stone composite floors can be installed in both Residential and commercial spaces. Residential spaces refers to Kitchens, Basements, Bathrooms, Living rooms and Garages! Commercial spaces refers to heavy traffic environments such as Offices, Public buildings, Retail shops, Restaurants , Showrooms, Daycares and common areas in buildings. 
Note: Our Stone Composite floors have not been tested or designed to be installed outdoors.

faqs.question: Is NewAge Stone Composite flooring easy to maintain?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our Stone composite floors are easy to maintain. Using a clean damp mop or cloth, wipe any spills as soon as possible and avoid using abrasive scrubbing tools. You can also vacuum your floors as long as it does not have a beater bar, a metal bar that rotates the brush roll, attached to it. Our high-quality floors don’t need to get waxed or polished and you’ll still have well-maintained floors. Please follow our care and maintenance guidelines carefully found in the link for tile: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-tile/ and for planks: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-plank/

faqs.question: Is the flooring suitable for use with kids and pets?
faqs.answer: Our rigorous testing procedures and FloorScore Certification should allow you to confidently install our floors in your space. It has been tested against scratching, heavyweights, spills and so much more than your floors should be able to handle your day-to-day life. Our FloorScore certification proves that our Stone Composite floors are in compliance with stringent indoor air quality emissions making them suitable for both kids and pets.

faqs.question: Are there flooring options that are better for people with allergies?
faqs.answer: Our easy to clean and hard surface floors are ideal for those with allergies! Our Stone Composite floors do not easily trap dust mites, pollen or pet hairs like some other types of flooring do. Make sure when cleaning your floors, use a clean damp mop or cloth and make sure you’re following our care and maintenance guidelines. You may find our maintenance guideline in the link for tile: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-tile/ and for planks: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-plank/

faqs.question: Do I need a professional contractor to install the floors or could I install them myself?
faqs.answer: If you like DIY projects and are confident in using power tools, you can install the floors yourself. Installing the floors are simple however you need to determine whether or not you can repair your subfloors and remove any old floors, if needed, before starting the install. As long as you have properly read through our Install guide and prepared your space correctly, our premium floor tiles and planks do not require professional contractors to install.

faqs.question: How quickly can the new flooring be installed?
faqs.answer: Once your space has been properly prepared and your tools are ready, installing floor tiles or planks in a 400 sqft room would take an average DIY installer approximately 5 hours to complete.

faqs.question: I received my order but I can’t find a physical install manual.
faqs.answer: In an effort to reduce our carbon footprint, NewAge Products is transitioning our install manuals online. You can find a link to our install guides on your floor tiles/planks cardboard boxes or just follow our link for tile: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-tile/ and for planks: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-plank/ . If you have any questions or inquiries, contact NewAge Products Customer Service at 1-877-306-8930. and select option 1 or use our live chat feature.

faqs.question: Can I install my NewAge Stone Composite floors on Radiant Heating systems?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can install your floors on radiant heating systems as long as the heating element is not in direct contact with the flooring. Please read through the General Subfloor Preparation section in our Flooring Install Guides to have a more detailed breakdown of how to prepare your space.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs I need to be aware of?
faqs.answer: Depending on your space and renovation, you may need to install new baseboards or quarter rounds to complete your space.

faqs.question: Can I polish my floors?
faqs.answer: Our exceptional Stone Composite Floors have a 0.7mm commercial-grade protective wear layer that does not require you to polish or wax your floors. Our wear layer keeps your floors protected and only requires to be cleaned using a clean damp mop/cloth or vacuum (without a beater bar). A beater bar is a metal bar that rotates with the brush roll.

faqs.question: Are my NewAge Stone Composite floors under warranty?
faqs.answer: Most definitely! Depending on your installed space we offer a Limited lifetime, Limited 10 year commercial and a Limited 5-year warranty.  Please read through our Flooring warranty and if you have any additional inquiries or questions, contact NewAge Products Customer Service at 1.877.306.8930 and select option 1.

faqs.question: Do my new Stone Composite floors need an acclimation period before starting install?
faqs.answer: Although acclimation is not required, for best results flooring can be acclimated for 24-48 hours in its desired environment before opening the cartons. Please read through our flooring install guide to have a more detailed breakdown of how to acclimate your floors, for tile: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-tile/ and for planks: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/luxury-vinyl-plank/

faqs.question: Can I use Studded tires on the NewAge Stone Composite flooring?
faqs.answer: No. Our Stone Composite Floors have not been tested for use with studded tires and are therefore not suitable for this application.

faqs.question: Are the floors resistant to chemicals?
faqs.answer: When exposed to accidents such as dirt, spills from household cleaning products, consumables and soiling from a pet, NewAge Stone Composite Flooring will not stain. In case of any accidents, it should be cleaned up immediately and should follow the proper Care and Maintenance breakdown provided. Mishandling of the product and lack of care will not be covered by the warranty.

faqs.question: Can I replace a damaged tile or plank?
faqs.answer: Yes. You will be required to carefully cut through the middle of the damaged tile or plank using a multi-tool cutter or a plunge saw. Carefully remove the damaged tile or plank without damaging the click-lock profiles of the surrounding floors. Apply cold-weld bonding glue along with the click-lock profiles of the surrounding floors and drop in the new tile or plank. Make sure the click-lock profiles are properly secured to each other. Using a rubber mallet, tap along the profiles and ensure the replaced tile or plank is installed properly. You can find a video of how to replace your floors in the link below: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/

faqs.question: Can I install the flooring in my shed?
faqs.answer: As long as you have read through our install guides and followed the proper space preparation, you may be able to install NewAge Stone Composite flooring in your shed as long as it follows the requirements.

faqs.question: I have finished the install and I have extra product, what should I do with it?
faqs.answer: Keep it! In the unlikely event, your product is damaged during normal use, you will want to ensure to keep some leftover planks or tiles to easily replace any damaged areas.

faqs.answer: Your order can be returned within 120 days from the date your order was delivered. Some restrictions may apply.

faqs.question: Will I be charged for the return shipping?
faqs.answer: You may be subject to a 20% restocking fee on returned items, which will be automatically charged on your original method of payment once the order is received back at our warehouse facility. You will not be charged for return shipping.

faqs.question: Do I need to return the product by myself?
faqs.answer: No,  NewAge will arrange the pickup of the products from your shipping address.

faqs.answer: Yes, installed or used products will not be refunded.

faqs.question: Do I need to be available at the time of return pickup.
faqs.answer: Someone at the pickup address has to be available to sign the pickup receipt.

faqs.question: Will you send me the packaging if I don't have the packaging to repack the product?
faqs.answer: No, unfortunately NewAge cannot supply extra packaging for returns.

faqs.question: Can I mount a sink?
faqs.answer: A sink can be mounted to the 2-Door with Drawer Cabinet or the 2-Door Cabinet. Any modifications of the cabinet would void the warranty of that particular item.

faqs.question: Is it possible to have custom cabinets designed?
faqs.answer: NewAge Products does not customize cabinets, our cabinets come fully assembled. However, our Home Bar cabinets are offered in multiple colours and are modular so they can be arranged in a configuration that suits your style and space. NewAge Products offers planning guides and a free 3D design service to help you plan the perfect set to fit your space. For more information visit our Design Services page.

faqs.question: Can I buy additional hardware?
faqs.answer: At this time, we do not sell the hardware for the home bar series

faqs.question: Can I put my own hardware?
faqs.answer: The cabinets have pre-drilled holes, so any hardware purchased to replace the existing ones would need to be the same dimensions as the current ones.

faqs.question: Can I mount my own countertop?
faqs.answer: Our cabinets can accommodate custom countertops. However, NewAge Products sells countertops as well.

faqs.question: Can I buy additional shelves?
faqs.answer: We do offer additional shelves for the Home Bar Cabinets

faqs.question: Can I buy extra side panels?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we do not sell side panels at this time for the Home Bar Cabinets

faqs.question: Are the cabinets assembled?
faqs.answer: All of our cabinets arrive pre-assembled and need minimal assembly.

faqs.question: How are the cabinets shipped?
faqs.answer: The cabinets are shipped on a regular or an oversize pallet.

faqs.question: Does NewAge offer an Island?
faqs.answer: By adding a few of our base cabinets to one another, you can create your own island. Our granite countertop options offer you the option for an overhang.

faqs.question: How do I install lights to the Home Bar sets?
faqs.answer: Please refer to the home bar installation guide at https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/bar-cabinets

faqs.question: Are the cabinets lockable?
faqs.answer: The Display Cabinet is the only cabinet that is lockable.

faqs.question: Do you have a showroom?
faqs.answer: As an e-commerce company, we do not have any showrooms, but you can view our extensive media content to help you make your purchasing decision.

faqs.question: What can I clean the Stainless Steel cabinets with?
faqs.answer: To clean the cabinets you can use a soft cloth with soap and water. For hazing and hard-to-clean spills and messes, you may use a stainless steel cleaner.

faqs.question: How do the OKC Cover works
faqs.answer: Covers are available for Individual cabinet.  They are attached with Velcro and hook under the Kick plate.

faqs.question: Is the Bar Cabinet Refrigerated?
faqs.answer: No, the Bar cabinet is not refrigerated. However, The bar cabinet offers a chilling beverage drawer to keep your drinks chill.

faqs.question: What size refrigerator/fridge can I fit in the configuration
Do we offer Fridge or Ice Maker
faqs.answer: We do not offer Fridge or Ice Maker but, any 24"W x 24" D x 35"H Dimension Fridge or Ice Maker can be incorporated in the layout.

faqs.question: Can I place the Fridge/Refrigerator inside the cabinet?
faqs.answer: We don't recommend it as this is something we never tested.

faqs.question: Can I install Garbage Disposal Under Sink?
faqs.answer: Yes, Garbage disposals can be installed under the sink.

faqs.question: What should be the gap between grill and wall or Can it be flush to the wall?
faqs.answer: The grill and cabinet must have a minimum clearance of 18" rear and 10" clearance on the sides. from combustible materials.

faqs.question: How much clearance do I need to have behind the hood to open?
faqs.answer: There should be at least a clearance of 18" for the rear and 10" clearance for sides.

faqs.question: What adapter do I need for the Outdoor Kitchen sink?
faqs.answer: We recommend a 3/8" x 1/2" NPT adapter. However, depending on your setup this may vary. Please contact us at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1 to speak with a Customer Service Representative for further assistance.

faqs.question: The doors/drawers do not close properly?
faqs.answer: The cabinets must be leveled and squared, please ensure this by adjusting the feet and adjusting the hinges

faqs.question: My tool drawer is locked and the key is inside
faqs.answer: The lock can be disengaged by turning the cabinet upside down, however, if the tool drawer does not disengage, please call us at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1 to speak with a Customer Service Representative.

faqs.question: The cabinets are stuck inside the locker, how do I get them out?
faqs.answer: You can easily remove the doors by following step-by-step instructions that are located in the product instruction guide. The steps may vary based on product and model.

faqs.question: My lock on the cabinet is too short, how do I fix this?
faqs.answer: A shelf needs to be placed centrally in the cabinet so when the lock is engaged, the latch hooks to the bottom lip of the shelf.

faqs.question: I have lost my key for the tool cabinet, or my tool cabinet is locked and I cannot open it
faqs.answer: If you have lost your key for your tool cabinet, or if you are unable to unlock your cabinet, please contact our customer service team at: support@neawgeproducts.com or call us at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1 to speak with a Customer Service Representative. Please have your order number readily available.

faqs.question: My doors/drawers do not close properly
faqs.answer: To ensure that your doors and drawers close properly, the cabinets must be levelled and squared on the floor by adjusting the levelling legs, and the hinges if necessary. If this does not rectify the problem, please complete the following steps: 1. Complete and submit the Replacement Form https://newageproducts.com/replacement/ and make sure that you include the following in your form: - order number - brief decryption of the damaged units - Pictures of the damages 2. After the form is submitted an automated email with a case ID will be sent and one of our customer service specialists will reach out to you via e-mail or by phone in regards to a resolution. If you require immediate assistance please call us at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1 to speak with a Customer Service Representative. Ensure that you have your order number on hand, and if you have submitted a Replacement Form, please reference your case ID.

faqs.question: What is the warranty?
faqs.answer: All Garage Cabinets have a limited lifetime warranty. However, please note that any modifications to the product will void the warranty.

faqs.question: Is it possible to get touch-up paint for my products?
faqs.answer: If you would like to make a request for touch-up paint for your products, please contact our customer service team at: support@neawgeproducts.com or call us at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1 to speak with a Customer Service Representative. Please have your order number readily available.

faqs.question: Am I able to alter configuration of my cabinets?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can alter the configuration of your cabinets, however, keep in mind the number and sizes of worktops included with your set, and also be aware that depending on your desired configuration, you may need to purchase extra brackets to support the worktops.

faqs.question: Can I purchase more locker, wall cabinet or base cabinet shelves?
faqs.answer: Yes, additional shelves for any of our garage cabinets can be found on https://shopnewage.com/collections/garage-shelves

Visit our website to learn more about our installation services options.

faqs.question: Can I put casters on a tall locker cabinet / tall cabinet?
faqs.answer: Locker/Tall cabinets are not designed to be on casters as there are chances of tipping over of the cabinet.

faqs.question: Do all cabinets have different keys for the locks?
faqs.answer: The key is the same for all the locks of the cabinet series.

faqs.question: Are the cabinets waterproof?
faqs.answer: No, the cabinets are not water proof. They are water-resistant.

faqs.question: Can I mount the Pro wall shelf horizontally?
faqs.answer: Yes, it could, please see the installation guide for more details.

faqs.question: Can I mount the Pro wall shelf vertically?
faqs.answer: Yes, it could, please see the installation guide for more details.

faqs.question: Is the cable of the Pro wall mount shelf strong enough to hold the weight as mentioned?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is aircraft grade steel cables.

faqs.question: Which is better mounting the Pro series wall shelf on the wall or the ceiling?
faqs.answer: The eye pad plates could be mounted to either the wall or ceiling, both are perfectly acceptable.

faqs.question: What is the metal used for Pro wall mount shelf?
faqs.answer: It is made out of 12 & 14 gauge steel.

faqs.question: What if the spacing of the studs do not align with the install locations?
faqs.answer: Installation of a wood brace in between the irregular located joists could be a possibility. For further information, please call our customer service at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 1.

faqs.question: What if the spacing of my ceiling joists do not match the desired size and direction?
faqs.answer:
Eye pad plates can be positioned up to 6 inches side to side or 12 inches front to back to align with a
ceiling joist. If you are not installing the pad eye plates in the intended location, the height of the shelf
needs to be adjusted according to the values in the table in the guide.

faqs.question: Can the Pro Series Wall Mount Shelf be installed on a concrete wall?
faqs.answer: Yes and it does come with the concrete anchors in order to do so. See the installation guide for more details.

faqs.question: What is included in one 40 sq. ft. PVC Slatwall kit?
faqs.answer: In each 40sqft PVC slatwall kit there are: Six 80inch wide Silver PVC slatwall panels, Color matching screws Two end trims, One corner trim, One H-shaped trim

faqs.question: Are NewAge slatwall Hook accessories compatible with Slatwall?
faqs.answer: Yes, all of NewAge’s Slatwall hook accessories are compatible with the PVC Slatwall. The Small Parts Bins require a Small Parts Bins Support bracket to be compatible with PVC Slatwall. Some of our Accessory Kits already include the Small Parts Bins Support bracket. If the Support bracket is not included in a particular set, it will be noted.

faqs.question: What type of slatwall hook accessories can I use with the slatwall?
faqs.answer: The 40 sq. ft. PVC slatwall is compatible with most 3 inch on-centre slatwall hook accessories.

faqs.question: Is it easy to cut the 40 sq. ft. PVC Slatwall?
faqs.answer: Yes - you may use different power tools such as miter saws, jig saws, table saws and even multi-tool cutters for smaller and complicated cuts.

faqs.question: Can I install cabinets on the PVC slatwall panels and what would be the weight capacity?
faqs.answer: You can install NewAge Cabinets using our NewAge Slatwall brackets. Please refer to our Install manual on https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/slatwall/ for reference. The total weight capacity per cabinet is 400lbs including the cabinet itself. If installing the PVC slatwall on 24inch stud spacing, cabinets should not be installed.

faqs.question: What are the type of installs I can do?
faqs.answer: Depending on your space, you may install a single 40 sq. ft. PVC Slatwall kit or multiple of them to create full and corner wall installs. Please refer to our Installation Manual found on https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/slatwall/ for reference.

faqs.question: Does this have to be installed on a wall?
faqs.answer: Yes, its does. Because once put together, if there is going to be heavy items stored up high, it could tip over, if not secured to a wall.

faqs.question: Could I install on a concrete wall?
faqs.answer: Yes, but you would need to purchase your own concrete anchors or screws.

faqs.question: Could I attach this to my Pro 3.0 / Bold 3.0 multi-use locker cabinets?
faqs.answer: Yes, they could be interlocked with the locker cabinets with the lock nut bolts and washers.

faqs.question: Are the shelves adjustable?
faqs.answer: The middle shelves are adjustable, the top and bottom shelves are fixed.

faqs.question: Could this be installed off the ground?
faqs.answer: Yes, just make sure you are securing into the wooden studs.

faqs.question: Can the LED lights be hardwired to a wall switch?
faqs.answer: No, the adapter plug should only be used with the NewAge LED unit with the ON/OFF switch. The power adapter cord needs to plug into the LED housing end without the ON/OFF switch.

faqs.question: How many LEDs Lights can be hooked up on 1 light chain?
faqs.answer: A maximum of four lights can be hooked up on one chain, including the LED Light with power adapter.

faqs.question: What is the light color of the Home Kitchen LEDs?
faqs.answer: The Home Kitchen LEDs have a 4000k color temperature.

faqs.question: My LEDs are hooked up and connected to power but aren’t working?
faqs.answer: For the LEDs Lights to be operational make sure the adapter cable is connected to the LED housing end with ON/OFF switch.

faqs.question: What is the NewAge Garage Stool made out of?
faqs.answer: The cushioned seat is made out of a black polyurethane fabric stitched to a plywood and polypropylene backing while the base is made out of chrome plated steel with adjustable feet.

faqs.question: What is the weight capacity of the NewAge Garage Stool?
faqs.answer: The Garage Stool is for anyone weighing up to 120 kgs / 265 lbs. It is not recommended for use by anyone weighing more than 120kgs / 265 lbs.

faqs.question: Can I use the NewAge Garage Stool as a step?
faqs.answer: No. The stool has been designed for seating purposes only and should not be used as a step.

faqs.question: Does the Garage stool swivel around?
faqs.answer: Yes, the garage stool has a swivel plate incorporated to make it easier to work in your space.

faqs.question: Does the Garage stool come with castors?
faqs.answer: No, the NewAge Garage stools do not come with castors

faqs.question: How can I maintain or clean my Garage Stool?
faqs.answer: You can spot clean with a damp cloth soaked in water or mild soap and dry with a soft, clean cloth. To avoid damage to the stool do not use abrasives, flammable fluids, or harsh chemicals to clean the stool.

faqs.question: Does the 1500W Infrared Heater come with a remote control?
faqs.answer: Yes, a remote control is included with the 1500w Infrared Heater. With the remote control, you are able to adjust the power manually, set specific power levels, switch to timer modes and turn the heater on and off.

faqs.question: Can a single remote control provided adjust multiple heaters?
faqs.answer: Yes, the remote control provided will be able to adjust multiple heaters.

faqs.question: What is the power of the three main settings that are pre-defined with the 1500W Infrared Heater?
faqs.answer: Aside from manually increasing or decreasing the power using the remote control, there are three preconfiguredsettings you can use. The first level setting is 600W , the second level setting is 900W and the third level setting is 1500W

faqs.question: Does the 1500W infrared Heater come with a slatwall mounting bracket?
faqs.answer: No, the slatwall mounting bracket will need to be purchased individually.

faqs.question: Is any maintenance and cleaning required for the 1500W infrared Heater?
faqs.answer: Yes it is important to perform careful and regular maintenance of the device in accordance with the recommendation's made in the install manual provided and found on https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/garage-accessories/

faqs.question: How can I install the Infrared Heater on Slatwall?
faqs.answer: The 1500w Infrared Heater can be installed on our NewAge Steel and PVC slatwall by purchasing the Infrared Heater Slatwall Bracket separately.

faqs.question: Is the 1500w Infrared Heater Slatwall Bracket compatible with all Slatwall Panels?
faqs.answer: The Infrared Heater Slatwall Bracket is compatible with all NewAge Steel and PVC slatwalls. It has been designed to be compatible with most 3 inch on-center slatwall panels

faqs.question: How long can I set the timer for?
faqs.answer: The timer can be set up to 9 hours

faqs.question: Where can I install my NewAge Home Cabinets?
faqs.answer: You can install your NewAge cabinets in both Residential and Commercial spaces. Residential spaces refer to interior spaces such as kitchens, basements, bathrooms, living rooms, and laundry rooms. Commercial spaces refer to heavy traffic environments such as offices, retail shops, showrooms, and common areas in buildings.

faqs.question: What is the advantage of the frameless versus the framed cabinets?
faqs.answer: The frameless cabinets offer more storage then the alternative framed cabinets. Additionally, these offer a more contemporary aesthetic without the division created by the framed construction.

faqs.question: Are NewAge cabinets easy to maintain?
faqs.answer: NewAge cabinets are easy to clean and maintain! Using a clean damp cloth, wipe any spills as soon as possible and avoid using abrasive scrubbing tools. Please follow our care and maintenance guideline carefully found in the link: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/home-cabinets

faqs.question: Do I need a professional contractor to install these cabinets or could I install them myself?
faqs.answer: Installing a kitchen is considered a major project, and many different skills are needed to be able complete the project correctly. There are many tools needed to make the process smoother, and NewAge recommends using a professional kitchen installer for the best overall installation experience. We recommend booking your installer to begin work one week after receiving the products to avoid any delay in installation, due to missing/damage products during the transit.

faqs.question: I received my order but I can’t find a physical install manual.
faqs.answer: To reduce our carbon footprint, NewAge is transitioning to digital install manuals. You can find a link to our install guides by scanning the QR code in the one pager included with your purchase or just follow our link: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/home-cabinets . If you have any questions or enquiries, contact our Customer Service team at 1.877.306.8930.

faqs.question: Are NewAge cabinets under warranty?
faqs.answer: When this product is installed, operated and maintained according to the instructions, NewAge provides a Limited Lifetime Warranty to replace the defective product or parts if the part fails as a result of defective materials or workmanship. Please read through our Home Cabinet warranty and if you have any additional inquiries or questions, contact our Customer Service team at 1.877.306.8930.

faqs.question: How do I adjust the drawers or door of my cabinets?
faqs.answer: Check out our instructional videos to learn how to adjust cabinet drawers: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/cabinet-hardware and https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/home-cabinets

faqs.question: Can I install the wall cabinets without the hanging rail?
faqs.answer: The wall cabinets are specifically designed to be installed with the wall rail, we can not endorse an installation through the back panel.

faqs.question: Do you offer custom size cabinets?
faqs.answer: We offer a selection of custom door finishes, in both paints and stains, but only offer our standard cabinet dimensions.

faqs.question: How many cut out holes are required for water supply in the sink cabinet?
faqs.answer: Our Sink Cabinet is open back to make it easier for water connections.

faqs.question: Can I install a custom sink?
faqs.answer: Our Sink Cabinet is open top; therefore you can select your own custom sink without having to worry about additional cutting or drilling.

faqs.question: Is my granite countertop sealed?
faqs.answer: NewAge Granite Countertops do not come pre-sealed.

faqs.question: Do I need to seal my countertop?
faqs.answer: A sealed countertop is not required for indoor use. For outdoor use, a sealed countertop is highly recommended. A sealed countertop will reduce the risk surface stains and damages. A protected stone will be easier to maintain as well.

faqs.question: Are NewAge Granite Countertops easy to maintain?
faqs.answer: NewAge Granite Countertops are easy to maintain! Using a clean damp cloth, wipe any spills as soon as possible and avoid using abrasive scrubbing tools. Please follow our care and maintenance guideline carefully found in the link: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/granite-countertops

faqs.question: Will heat damage my countertop?
faqs.answer: NewAge Granite Countertops are temperature resistant; this means that they are able to withstand the heat of pots and pans without damage.(It takes 80 to 90-degree difference within your granite countertops to cause enough thermal stress to cause it to crack. If you heat a piece of granite uniformly, it will take many hundreds of degrees before any problems arise. Please note granite tops will draw the heat from food dishes or a delivered pizza very quickly.)

faqs.question: Can I cut directly on my granite countertop?
faqs.answer: Granite is a hard stone; using a kitchen knife on this surface is unlikely to result in scratches. While knives will not scratch the stone, cutting directly on the countertop is not recommended. Acidic substances found in many foods can potentially penetrate the stone and cause discoloration. Additionally, you run the risk of damaging and dulling your knives.

faqs.question: Will my countertops fade over time?
faqs.answer: Granite is a natural stone that will fade if it is left out in direct sunlight over the course of several years. Fading in an interior setting is less common, as UV rays from indoor lights are much less corrosive than sunlight.

This warranty is valid 15 years from the purchase date of the product. Please read through our Home Cabinet warranty and if you have any additional inquiries or questions, contact NewAge Products Customer Service at 1.877.306.8930.

faqs.question: Do NewAge Sinks come with a pre-drilled faucet hole?
faqs.answer: NewAge Sinks come pre-drilled for a mono-faucet. If another type of faucet is preferred, a metal hole saw will be required. Please follow the specific instructions provided by the faucet supplier when installing your faucet.

faqs.question: Can my sink rust?
faqs.answer: NewAge Sinks are made from 304 grade stainless steel and are corrosion resistant. However, rust stains may form over time if the sink is not properly maintained, caused by deposits from water or foods. Scrubbing the stains with a mild cleanser or metal cleaner should solve this problem immediately. Be sure to clean in the same direction as the grain lines of the finish.

faqs.question: Can hardwater spots be removed?
faqs.answer: If you notice hard water spots on the surface of your sink, take the following steps to bring your sink back to its original condition. 1. Apply clean water with a cleaning sponge and rub gently in the direction of the grain. If the mark won’t shift, it may be necessary to use a stainless steel cleaner, in which case apply the cleaner and rub gently. 2. After cleaning it is important to rinse the stainless steel with clean fresh water and buff with a soft cloth. Remember to always rub with the grain, NEVER across as you will ruin the finish, and the steel can lose its shine. If you must use a scourer, use a plastic scrub pad with no metal content.

faqs.question: Can I use a rubber mat in my sink?
faqs.answer: We do not recommend using a rubber mat. This will trap water, causing iron deposits and surface discoloration over time.

faqs.question: Can my sink withstand extreme temperature?
faqs.answer: Stainless steel withstands extreme hot and cold temperatures, along with sudden temperature changes. That means that you can drain hot boiling pasta in your sink, followed with a rinse of ice-cold water, without causing any damage to your sink's surface.

faqs.question: Are the NewAge sinks certified?
faqs.answer: NewAge sinks are cUPC certified, meeting US and Canadian plumbing requirements.

faqs.question: Is the sink compatible with compost compacter?
faqs.answer: NewAge Sinks are manufactured with 16 gauge stainless steel thick material and should withstand the weight and pressure of standard consumer compost compacters. Please understand the installation requirements of the compost compacter before installation.

faqs.question: Are the NewAge sinks under warranty?
faqs.answer: When this product is installed, operated and maintained according to the instructions, NewAge provides a Limited Lifetime Warranty to replace the defective product or parts if the part fails as a result of defective materials or workmanship. Please read through our Home Cabinet warranty and if you have any additional inquiries or questions, contact NewAge Products Customer Service at 1.877.306.8930.

faqs.question: Can I use a faucet other than what NewAge offers?
faqs.answer: Yes, you may choose to purchase a faucet elsewhere and these will be compatible with our Sinks. Ensure you look for a mono style kitchen faucet; the hole dimension on the sink is 1.5 inches in diameter.

faqs.answer: The faucets offered at NewAge have a maximum flow rate of 1.8 gallons per minute to ensure that they meet the requirements for California water efficiency standards.

faqs.question: Can I connect a portable dishwasher to my kitchen faucet?
faqs.answer: Portable dishwashers may be connected to any faucet that is not a pull-out or pull-down design. Portable dishwashers should never be connected to pull-out or pull-down kitchen faucets due to potential pressure fluctuations during dishwasher operation that may result in rupturing of the house.

faqs.question: How can I remove mineral deposits from my aerator?
faqs.answer: Remove the aerator. Soak it in vinegar overnight then flush it with water, rubbing it with a toothbrush if the deposits are stubborn. If wouldn’t hurt to do this on a regular basis, just to keep your aerator clear of debris.

faqs.question: Do I need to be available at the time of return pickup.
faqs.answer: Someone at the pickup address has to be available to sign the pickup receipt.

faqs.question: Will you send me the packaging if I don't have the packaging to repack the product?
faqs.answer: No, unfortunately NewAge cannot supply extra packaging for returns.

faqs.question: Should I buy more backsplash than the surface to cover?
faqs.answer: We suggest purchasing an extra 5 to 10% for cutting errors, breakages, and a few spares.

faqs.question: Can I return unused tiles?
faqs.answer: Our return policy does not apply to the return or exchange of open boxes. The extra tiles can stored away for future use or in case of future damage.

faqs.question: Should I install my wall shelves/cabinets over the backsplash?
faqs.answer: Wall shelves and cabinets should both be installed on the wall and not over the glass backsplash. If installed over glass there is a high risk of breakage during installation.

faqs.question: Can I place a smaller order of backsplash then the 11sqft?
faqs.answer: We only offer the rectangular backsplash style in a box of 11sq/ft and the hexagon backsplash style in a box of 9.6 sq/ft. We do not offer individual backsplash tiles.

faqs.question: Are the NewAge backsplash easy to maintain?
faqs.answer: Our backsplashes are easy to maintain. Using a clean damp cloth, wipe any spills as soon as possible and avoid using abrasive scrubbing tools. Please follow our care and maintenance guideline carefully found in the link: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/glass-tile-backsplash

faqs.question: Are the NewAge backsplash under warranty?
faqs.answer: When this product is installed, operated and maintained according to the instructions NewAge will replace the defective product or parts if the part fails as a result of defective materials or workmanship for One Year from the purchase date of the product. Please read through our Home Cabinet warranty and if you have any additional inquiries or questions, contact NewAge Products Customer Service at 1.877.306.8930.

faqs.question: What grout should I use for my installation?
faqs.answer: The type of grout recommended for glass installation will vary by brand and product line; we recommend following the advice from a home improvement specialist or tile installer. WARNING : Certain acids will damage glass tile and natural stone. DO NOT allow products that contain hydrofluoric, hydrochloric, muriatic or phosphoric acid to come in direct contact with the tile.

faqs.answer: Please reach out to our resolutions team at 1-877-306-8930 and select option 3 or send an email to resolutions@newageproducts.com

faqs.question: What is the return period?
faqs.answer: Your order can be returned within 120 days from the date your order was delivered. Some restrictions may apply.

faqs.question: Will I be charged for the return shipping?
faqs.answer: You may be subject to a 20% restocking fee on returned items, which will be automatically charged on your original method of payment once the order is received back at our warehouse facility. You will not be charged for return shipping.

faqs.question: Do I need to return the product by myself?
faqs.answer: No,  NewAge will arrange the pickup of the products from your shipping address.

faqs.question: Do I need to package up my order if I am doing a return?
faqs.answer: Products being returned must be ready for pick-up in the original boxes and securely placed on a pallet if applicable. If the original boxes are not available, the product should be securely wrapped in cardboard and placed on a pallet prior to the courier arriving.

faqs.question: To return the product, does it have to be in unused condition?
faqs.answer: Yes, installed or used products will not be refunded.

faqs.answer: No, unfortunately NewAge cannot supply extra packaging for returns.

faqs.question: What is the best way to care for my product?
faqs.answer: Clean the hardware with a damp cloth, wipe any spills as soon as possible and avoid using abrasive scrubbing tools. Please follow our care and maintenance guideline carefully found in the link: https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/cabinet-hardware

faqs.question: Do these decorative hardware ship with screws?
faqs.answer: All of NewAge handles/knobs or pulls come with screws. We ship three different lengths of screws for the different applications; One to fit on the frame of all of our doors and drawer fronts, one to install on the painted doors panel, and the last one is to be installed on the solid wood door panels.

faqs.question: What is the difference between a hollow and solid hardware? Does it matter?
faqs.answer: A solid knob or pull is a solid piece of metal; therefore, it feels heavy and rich and it will not easily dent or crease. It is also harder to strip because there are threads down the whole depth of the product.

faqs.question: What is the Center to Center measurement?
faqs.answer: The Center to Center (CTC) is the distance between the screw holes on a pull. For the small Handles, the CTC measurement is 128mm. For the large Handles, the CTC measurement is 288mm.

faqs.question: What is the warranty for these decorative hardware?
faqs.answer: When this product is installed, operated and maintained according to the instructions, NewAge provides a Limited Lifetime Warranty to replace the defective product or parts if the part fails as a result of defective materials or workmanship. Please read through our Home Cabinet warranty and if you have any additional inquiries or questions, contact NewAge Products Customer Service at 1.877.306.8930.

faqs.question: Can the LED lights be hardwired to a wall switch?
faqs.answer: No, the adapter plug should only be used with the NewAge LED unit with the ON/OFF switch. The power adapter cord needs to plug into the LED housing end without the ON/OFF switch.

faqs.question: How many LEDs Lights can be hooked up on 1 light chain?
faqs.answer: A maximum of four lights can be hooked up on one chain, including the LED Light with power adapter.

faqs.question: What is the light color of the Home Kitchen LEDs?
faqs.answer: The Home Kitchen LEDs have a 4000k color temperature.

faqs.question: What is the brightness of the Home Kitchen LEDs?
faqs.answer: The Home Kitchen LEDs have a 315 Lumens light output. The LEDs are also dimmable at 3 different light settings.

faqs.question: My LEDs are hooked up and connected to power but aren’t working?
faqs.answer: For the LEDs Lights to be operational make sure the adapter cable is connected to the LED housing end with ON/OFF switch.

faqs.question: Where can I find the product dimensions?
faqs.answer: All product dimensions can be found on each of the product information pages.

faqs.question: Where can I access the installation guides and manuals for my products?

faqs.question: Where are your products manufactured?
faqs.answer: Our products are manufactured in different parts of the world that specialize in different manufacturing techniques. This includes Canada, the USA, China and Malaysia.

faqs.question: Are Your Grills And Side Burners Natural Gas Ready?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose either natural gas or a propane gas set up when ordering your unit.

faqs.question: Can we use the Dual side burner/grill indoor?
faqs.answer: No, the Dual Side Burner/Outdoor Grill is designed to use outdoor only.

faqs.question: Where Are These Grills Made?
faqs.answer: NewAge Grills are designed in Canada and manufactured in China.

faqs.question: How many burners are in your Performance and Platinum Grills?
faqs.answer: Depending on the size of grill you choose, the performance grill comes with up to 4 tube burners and the platinum grill comes with up to 3 main H-burners

faqs.question: How are the LED lights powered?
faqs.answer: The LED lights are powered with an Electrical Transformer included in with your purchase. Please refer to the following pages of the instruction manual for installation and wiring: - 40" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 16 & 49 - 33" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 16 & 49 - Dual Side Burner https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burner): Pages 12 & 37 *Warning: Please make sure to follow all warning instructions prior to installing you BBQ and/or Dual Side Burner.

faqs.question: Where do you turn on the LED lights?
faqs.answer: You can view the control layout in the Instruction Manual for your purchase on the following pages and/or see images below: - 40" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Page 34 - 33" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Page 34 - Dual Side Burner https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burner): Page 30

faqs.question: Can The Grill Be Purchased Without The Burner Accessory?
faqs.answer: No, the Burner Accessory is included with the Grills.

faqs.question: Do you have to install the rotisserie?
faqs.answer: Yes, the rotisserie requires minor installation. Please click on your BBQ users manual link below and refer to the following pages: - 40" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): INSTALLING BRIQUETTES, GRATES, AND ROTISSERIE (Pages 14 & 15) - 33" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): INSTALLING BRIQUETTES, GRATES, AND ROTISSERIE (Pages 14 & 15) *Warning: Please make sure to follow all warning instructions prior to installing you BBQ.

faqs.question: Will parts of the grill be hotter than other parts?
faqs.answer: There may be parts in between the briquette trays, that have an open flame which may cause some spots to be hotter than others.

faqs.question: Are there any recommendations on how to maintain/clean my BBQ and/or Dual Side Burner?
faqs.answer: To clean the cabinets you can use a soft cloth with soap and water. For hazing and hard-to-clean spills and messes, you may use a stainless steel cleaner.

faqs.question: Once the BBQ grill/Side Burner is hooked up, how do I check the lines/hoses for leaks?
faqs.answer: Checking for leaks is important before initial use, annually, and whenever any gas components are replaced or serviced. The instructions to test for leaks can be found in the instructions manual. Click on one of the links below associated with your purchase for details: - 40" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Leak Testing Instructions (Page 31 & 32) - 33" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Leak Testing Instructions (Page 31 & 32) - Dual Side Burner https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burners): Leak Testing Instructions (Page 27 & 28)

faqs.question: Can the BBQ Grill/Side Burner be installed against a wall?
faqs.answer:
The grill and cabinet must have a minimum clearance from combustible materials.

faqs.question: Can the burners be removed so another manufacture burner be used?
faqs.answer: Removing the burner is not recommended and may void the warranty.

faqs.question: Are there any spaces around the BBQ when it's installed with the Insert Grill Cabinet?
faqs.answer: As long as you purchase the same size NewAge Products BBQ (33" or 40") with a 33" or 40" Insert grill cabinet, there will not be any exposed space around the BBQ and the cabinet.

faqs.question: How does the outdoor covers work if we use another manufacture BBQ?
faqs.answer: The covers are designed for the NewAge BBQ however, it does accommodate some extra room for BBQs from other manufacturers, but cannot be guaranteed.

faqs.question: Can you cut out the back panel to accommodate the gas line?
faqs.answer: To accommodate the gas line, there is a pre-cut holes that is 20" H and 13.5" W on the back the insert grill cabinet.

faqs.question: Can I install a garbage can in insert grill cabinet if I am not using the pull out propane tank?
faqs.answer: It is not recommended, due to the heat from the BBQ it is not safe practice.

faqs.question: Do we offer any grill accessories?
faqs.answer: Yes! You may view the accessories we offer here https://shopnewage.com/collections/outdoor-accessories

faqs.question: Can rodents get in to the cabinets?
faqs.answer: There is a possibility as they might get in through the gas feed opening on the back. Which is located almost 2 feet off the ground.

faqs.question: The temperature gauge is fogged, how do I prevent this?
faqs.answer: This could happen due to weather conditions, usage of the BBQ grill should clear this up.

faqs.question: How long is the propane & gas hose?
faqs.answer:
The propane hose is 20 inches long.
The Natural gas hose is 10 feet long.

faqs.question: Does the Side Burner and the BBQ Grill need to be installed together?
faqs.answer: The products are modular and are not required to be installed together however, it is the easier of installations for Natural gas set ups.

faqs.question: What is the warranty for the BBQ Grill & Side Burner?
faqs.answer: Please click on the appropriate users manual link below and refer to the following pages for warranty instructions. - 40" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 9 - 33" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 9 - Dual Side Burner https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burners): Pages 8 *Warning: Please make sure to follow all warning instructions prior to installing you BBQ and/or Dual Side Burner.

faqs.question: How do I manually light the BBQ grill/side burner?
faqs.answer: If the ignitor is not working, you could use place a match in the alligator clip on the match holder which is located where the drip tray is to manually light the BBQ Grill & Side Burner. Please click the appropriate user manual link below and refer to the following pages for complete instructions. - 40" https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 35 - 33" https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 35 - Dual Side Burner https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burners): Pages 31 *Warning: Please make sure to follow all warning instructions prior to manually lighting your BBQ and/or Dual Side Burner.

faqs.question: Why is my flame so high and orange?
faqs.answer: An orange/yellow flame indicates that there is not enough oxygen. A blue flame that is high and off the grill indicates that there is not enough oxygen. Make sure the orifices are clean and no obstructions. The air shutter on the burners would have to be adjusted accordingly. Please refer to the Proper Burner Position and Operation of the instruction manual by clicking on the following link. - 40" https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 39 - 33" https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 39 - Dual Side Burner https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burners): Pages 32 *Warning: Please make sure to follow all warning instructions prior to adjusting your BBQ and/or Dual Side Burner.

faqs.question: How do I clean the burner?
faqs.answer: Please click on the Dual Side https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burners) and refer to pages 14 & 15 (Care and Maintenance of your Stainless Steel Grill) and 32 & 33 (Burner Maintenance and Cleaning) for instructions. *Warning: Please make sure to follow all warning instructions prior to cleaning your Dual Side Burner.

faqs.question: How do I replace the lightbulbs on my BBQ?
faqs.answer: Please click on the appropriate user manual link below and refer to the following pages for instructions on Replacing Lightbulbs. - 40" https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 42 - 33" https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 42 *Warning: Please make sure to follow all warning instructions prior to replacing your lightbulb on your BBQ.

faqs.question: Could I have the top grill tray (warming rack) and the rotisserie on at the same time?
faqs.answer: No, the top tray (warming rack) has to be flipped up or taken off for the rotisserie to rotate and function

faqs.question: How big is the grilling surface on the BBQ grill?
faqs.answer: The grilling surface of the 33" BBQ is 500 square inches and 637 square inches for the 40" BBQ.

faqs.question: Can the drip tray and grill grates be removed to be cleaned?
faqs.answer: Yes, it can.  We recommend cleaning the drip tray and grill grates after each use.

faqs.question: Should I check my BBQ Grill/side burner at the start of every season I use the items?
faqs.answer: At the start of each new grilling season remove the grilling racks and check the burners, vents, orifices and valves for obstructions. Spiders and insects often nest in these areas of the grill and can disrupt airflow, causing damage to the grill and personal injury. Also, check all hoses and fittings for damage, abrasion, wear and tear Please click on the appropriate user manual link below and refer to the following pages for warranty instructions. - 40" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 31 & 38-41 - 33" BBQ https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/outdoor-grills (Grills): Pages 31 & 38-41 - Dual Side Burner https://newageproducts.com/support-hub/dual-side-burners (Dual Side Burners): Pages 26 & 32-34

faqs.question: Should I cover my BBQ grill/side burner after each use?
faqs.answer: Yes, after the BBQ Grill and Side Burner are cool, it is recommended to cover.
